shingle.translation[0].definitions[0].de: one of many small thin pieces of wood or another building material, fastened in rows to cover a roof or wall
shingle.translation[0].definitions[1].de: small round pieces of stone on a beach
shingle.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: the crash of waves on the shingle
shingle.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to start your own business, especially as a lawyer or doctor
